doctor.name: Dr. Shahida Begum Minu
doctor.workplace: Khwaja Yunus Ali Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Shahida Begum Minu is a Gynecologist in Barisal. Her qualification is MBBS, DGO, MCPS (OBGYN), FCPS (OBGYN). She is a Former Associate Professor, Gynecology & Obstetrics at Khwaja Yunus Ali Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Shahida Begum Minu at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal is 10am to 12pm (Tue & Wed) & 4pm to 9pm (Sat, Sun, Mon, Thu & Fri).

doctor.name: Dr. Kazi Towkia Rahman
doctor.info: Dr. Kazi Towkia Rahman is a Gynecologist in Barisal. Her qualification is MBBS. DGO (BSMMU). She is a Consultant, Gyne & Obs Dept at Divisional Police Hospital, Barisal. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Royal City Hospital, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Kazi Towkia Rahman at Royal City Hospital, Barisal is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
